title: World Mental Health day: 'I have lost both my husband and daughter to suicide, within the past four years'
text:
Karen Sykes is looking through her phone at pictures and videos of her youngest daughter Bethany. One shows Beth, as she preferred to be called, looking glamorous in dark glasses with a flirty smile. In another, she is dancing with her older sisters Hayley, now 33, and Robyn, 30. Others show her cuddling with a friend’s baby, driving her prized black Mini, celebrating her degree.

Most poignant of all, are the short videos 26-year-old Beth filmed of herself with her stepfather Ian Sykes, an electronic engineer: laughing, making silly noises, singing along to Fleetwood Mac in the car. These are all Karen has of the pair of them, having lost them both to suicide in the past four years.

The hole...
description: Karen Sykes is looking through her phone at pictures and videos of her youngest daughter Bethany.
